Abu Mohammad Sarwar Farid ndc, afwc, psc is a major general of the Bangladesh Army currently serving as director general of National Security Intelligence and formerly the commandant of the Bangladesh Military Academy. Before that, he was deputy military secretary (DMS) at Bangladesh Army Headquarters and also served as director of armour in Army Headquarters, Armoured Directorate. He commanded 93 Armoured Brigade under 11th Infantry Division in Bogra. After that he served as a directing staff in Armed Forces War Course Wing in National Defence College, Bangladesh.
